ComicInfo.Title: Hyperbreed Part 5: Impact!
ComicInfo.Series: John Carpenter Presents Storm Kids: Hyperbreed
ComicInfo.Summary: Countdown to destruction. Byrr, Fext, and Cammo risk all as they make a final mad attempt to escape the monstrous Maks, destroy Eye-5's pirate fleet, reveal the Corporation's treasonous activities to the Government of Earth, and save the Earth from a looming Mak invasion. To succeed, they'll need the resurrection of a dead hero and some help from Lady Luck.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-05-22 18:37:10. [CVDB782176] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-15 10:26:46. [Issue ID 2567144]
ComicInfo.Penciller: Guy Dorian Sr.,Guy Dorian,Guy Dorian Sr.
ComicInfo.Inker: Sal Buscema,Scott Hanna,Guy Dorian,Sal Buscema,Scott Hanna
ComicInfo.AgeRating: Young Adult, Suggested Ages 12 and Older
